intro: Monadenium filiforme, commonly known as the slender monadenium, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Amaranthaceae and is characterized by its low-growing, succulent habit. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically clustered in dense inflorescences.
